content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nothing wrong with this clash. The only thing wrong is the fact that abecedarian is not an abecedarian word - why are they not called abcefinox words? Likewise, sadly palindrome is not a palindrome.

May be you could add some test cases :
- all words are Abecedarian
- words composed by just one letter

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun, understandable, accessible.
Good clash ! It's clear and we catch the goal quickly ... lots of possible solutions

Abecedarian words are words in which all the letters "descend" alphabetically.
Should be ascend from your examples
Why the separator is a comma and a space and not just a comma, or a space, or any other unique character? It's not very important, I know, but still, it would be simpler to understand.

Sorry @kobyarcher : i agree with @Code-Parser and @5DN1L ...
-> your Contribution is registered twice in the List ...
BUT : if you focus on this one ... i agree with your Contribution ...
-> I upvote for your job :-) !

Your contribution has been uploaded twice. Please remove one of them. The other link is:
https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/84594bff187780577da60ccd346979b6cba40

Goal
* Please change "You" to "Your".

* Please format "," as a {{constant}}.

Input
* Please add "and a space" at the end of the description.

Constraints
* Please mention that [[words]] contains at least 2 words.

Thanks.
thank you for pointing that out, it should be all sorted now
